SEO_TITLE: Alan Meza | Software developer specialized in web technologies
SEO_DESCRIPTION: I am a software developer specialized in web technologies. I have experience in frontend and backend development.
HOME_DESCRIPTION: I specialize in creating innovative, easy-to-use and intuitive websites that solve problems and improve the user experience. I combine creativity and technology to offer effective and attractive solutions.
FIRST_EXPERIENCE_DESCRIPTION: Maintenance, code refactoring, and development of new features for the main web application of Kami Electronics, using Scrum methodology for goals.
SECOND_EXPERIENCE_DESCRIPTION: Developed two news websites for external companies. Customized WordPress templates, integrated specific functionalities, and ensured an engaging and functional user experience.
THIRD_EXPERIENCE_DESCRIPTION: Development and implementation of a web-based ERP system to optimize the company's internal processes, applying modern technologies to enhance management and operational efficiency.
FIRST_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Web application for incident management following the ITIL methodology, built with React and Node.js.
SECOND_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Web application for restaurant management, made with React and Node.js.
THIRD_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Web application for school management, created with Vue and Node.js.
ABOUT_ME_DESCRIPTION: I am a passionate web developer dedicated to creating web pages for everyone, doing everything possible to improve their experience and solve their problems. My mission is to combine creativity in design with technology to offer attractive and user-friendly pages. Besides software engineering, I love watching series, a good iced coffee, music, and soccer.
FOOTER_DESCRIPTION: Designed with Figma, developed with Astro and Tailwind and deployed on Vercel
